video.title: Ancelotti: "Einziger Weg, um am Leben zu bleiben"
video.description: Real Madrid steht nach einem Nervenkrieg im Elfmeterschießen gegen Manchester City im Halbfinale der Champions League. Trainer Carlo Ancelotti rechtfertigte nach der Partie seinen defensiven Matchplan.

video.title: Guardiola: "Wir haben wirklich alles getan"
video.description: Titelverteidiger Manchester City ist im CL-Viertelfinale gegen Real Madrid im Elfmeterschießen gescheitert. Pep Guardiola ist trotz des bitteren Ausscheidens zufrieden mit der Leistung seines Teams.

video.title: Real get revenge on City - Data Review
video.description: Real Madrid had revenge on Manchester City, advancing to the Champions League semi-finals after a shootout win.

video.title: Rodri 'saw only one team play' in UCL quarter-final
video.description: Manchester City's Rodri says he 'saw only one team play' after getting knocked out on penalties to Real Madrid.

video.title: Man City have no regrets despite UCL exit - Guardiola
video.description: Pep Guardiola insists that his side should have no regrets in their UEFA Champions League exit to Real Madrid

video.title: FOOTBALL: UEFA Champions League: Manchester City v Real Madrid mixed-zone reaction (Rodri, Vinicius, Vazquez, Rudiger, Lunin)
video.description: Manchester City's Rodri says he saw 'only one team play' after getting knocked out on penalties to Real Madrid

video.title: FOOTBALL: UEFA Champions League: Real Madrid mixed-zone reaction (Ancelotti)
video.description: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti reacts to reaching the semi-finals of the Champions League.

video.title: FOOTBALL: UEFA Champions League: Manchester City post-match reaction (Guardiola)
video.description: Pep Guardiola insists that his side should have no regrets in their UEFA Champions League exit to Real Madrid

video.title: FOOTBALL: UEFA Champions League: Manchester City arrive at Etihad Stadium for Real Madrid clash
video.description: Pep Guardiola, Erling Haaland & the City squad look ready for action ahead of the crunch tie with Real Madrid

video.title: Haaland? Ancelotti: Weltbester Mittelstürmer
video.description: Vor dem CL-Rückspiel bei Manchester City lobt Real-Madrid-Coach Carlo Ancelotti City-Goalgetter Erling Haaland. Für ihn sei der Norweger vielleicht sogar der beste Mittelstürmer der Welt.

video.title: 'Haaland is the best centre forward in the world' - Ancelotti
video.description: Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti was delighted that his side kept 'dangerous' Erling Haaland quiet last week.

video.title: Bellingham: Rassistische Gesten "ekelhaft"
video.description: Ein Mallorca-Fan wurde dabei gefilmt, wie er beim Spiel gegen Real Madrid Aurélien Tchouaméni mit Affengesten beleidigte. Jude Bellingham fordert nun härtere Maßnahmen gegen derartige Aktionen.

video.title: FOOTBALL: UEFA Champions League: Real Madrid news conference (Ancelotti)
video.description: Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti was delighted that his side kept 'dangerous' Erling Haaland quiet last week.

video.title: Bellingham 'disgusted' by lack of prevention towards racism in LaLiga
video.description: Jude Bellingham says he is 'appalled' with how used to racist abuse his Real Madrid team-mates are.

video.title: Guardiola: "Habe Respekt vor Real, keine Angst"
video.description: Pep Guardiola trifft im Viertelfinale der Champions League zum wiederholten Male auf Real Madrid. Ein Angstgegner seien die Königlichen für den Katalanen aber in keinem Fall.

video.title: Guardiola: "Müssen Bellingham kontrollieren"
video.description: Jude Bellingham hat in seiner ersten Saison bei Real Madrid in 34 Spielen bereits 30 Torbeteiligungen. Trainer Pep Guardiola möchte für das CL-Rückspiel gegen die Königlichen besonders auf den Youngster aufpassen.

video.title: Guardiola calls double treble chances a 'hypothetical dream'
video.description: Pep Guardiola said Man City are taking things step by step, starting with Real Madrid in the Champions League.

video.title: Pep full of respect but doesn't fear Real Madrid
video.description: Pep Guardiola said his personal rivalry with Real Madrid is one full of respect, not fear.

video.title: FOOTBALL: UEFA Champions League: Real Madrid news conference (Bellingham)
video.description: Jude Bellingham says he is 'appalled' with how used to racist abuse his Real Madrid team-mates are.

video.title: City must control 'exceptional' Bellingham - Guardiola
video.description: Guardiola praised Bellingham's ability to adapt to life in Madrid and insists City must control him.
